title.narrative: Road Network Upgrading Sector Project (additional financing)

description.narrative: The proposed additional financing will support scaling up the Road Network Upgrading Sector Project. An additional 97 kilometers (km) of national roads will be upgraded and climate proofed in addition to the original core subproject, Manatuto to Natarbora (81 km) making 176 km in all. The project is in line with the ongoing efforts of the Asian Development Bank (ADB) and other development partners to support the progressive upgrading of the entire national road network.

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President

description.narrative:
Current project
MPWTC provides a more reliable and safer road network.
Overall project
Unchanged.

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President

Current project
a. By the end of 2019, travel time on the road between Manatuto and Natarbora drops 30% (2013 baseline: 3.5 hours); travel times on the road between Baucau and Lautem, Maubara and Karimbala, and Atabae and Mota Ain roads drop 15%.

description.narrative:
Current project
MPWTC provides a more reliable and safer road network.
Overall project
Unchanged.

title.narrative:
b. Rate of road accidents on project roads does not increase (crashes resulting in serious injury or loss of life per year).
Overall project
Unchanged.

description.narrative:
Current project
MPWTC provides a more reliable and safer road network.
Overall project
Unchanged.
